channel.title: ::Food Doesn't Work At Funpk...HELP!

item.title: ::Food Doesn't Work At Funpk...HELP!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Ok well I changed my command to this and it’s still giving me the same problem:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Food”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);

        sendMessage("Enjoy your food.");
} else if (absX >= 2569 && absX <= 2601 && absY >= 3904 && absY <= 3921) {
sendMessage("You no longer can use ::food at FunPk.");
}[/code]

item.title: ::Food Doesn't Work At Funpk...HELP!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Ok so I have a ::food command and I want to make it so when you’re at Funpk, it won’t let you use it…Here is my command:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Food”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);

        sendMessage("Enjoy your food.");
} else if (funPk()) {
sendMessage("You no longer can use ::food at FunPk.");
}[/code]

That doesn’t work…All it does is send you the message saying “You no longer can use ::food at FunPk.” When you tele away from FunPk…Can somebody help me?

Read full topic
